DESCRIPTION: Released in 2010 this full-bodied port cask finish is a real credit to the distillery.  Hugely mature and at 50%, this malt is very complex.
This is a lovely 12-year-old bottling from the Aberfeldy Distillery.  It comes with a presentation tube. This 12 Year Old is an excellent introduction to this Highland distillery.

Highland Park 12 Year Old - one of the best malts in the world year on year. This bottling has been in its core range for over 100 years.
Michael Jackson, Malt Whisky Companion regards this whisky as "The greatest all-rounder in the world of malt whisky."
This Glenburgie 15 Year Old is estimated to have been bottled in the 1990s.
An older release of 10 Year Old from Talisker distillery on the Isle of Skye.  Aged for a minimum of 10 years in American oak casks.
Glenburgie 8 Year Old is a trademark of proprietors: J G Stodart Ltd. It was specially selected, produced and bottled by and under responsibility by Gordon & MacPhail.

Handcrafted in Speyside in pot stills, this 12 year old is a classic.
Situated on the outskirts of the Royal Burgh of Elgin on the banks of the River Lossie.

A distillery owned by the spirits giant Diageo, Cragganmore is one of their Speyside malts that more than holds its own year on year.
Haven't tried it and like a smooth Speyside? This is your bottle!
This Arran single malt early bottling of no age statement Arran single malt, matured in sherry casks.  This is a long-discontinued edition, released around the millennium.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Macallan - A Sensory Journey - Personal Binder
DESCRIPTION: This leather style personal binder depicting The Macallan 'The Sensory Journey.'
An older release of 10 Year Old from Talisker distillery on the Isle of Skye.  Aged for a minimum of 10 years in American oak casks.

This is an older style bottling of the popular Glenlivet 12-Year-Old, that has been finished in French Limousin Oak casks. Limousin Oak is a popular choice for the maturation of Cognac. Glenlivet were one of the first to use French oak for making Whisky, a technique that has since been imitated the world over.

This Glenfiddich bottling won the Gold Medal at the 2007 International Wine and Spirit Competition.
It has been aged for a total of 12 years in both Oloroso Sherry and Bourbon Cask.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Strathmill - 10 Year Old - Wilson & Morgan - Barrel Selection
DESCRIPTION: Distilled in 1985, this 10 Year Old Strathmill was bottled by Wilson & Morgan in 1996 as part of their Barrel Selection series.

Ballantine's Vitality, a plentiful, pure grain scotch whisky featuring a revitalising taste and distinctive aroma. The Ballantine Vitality Pure Grain bottle was released as part of the Ballantine's Sensation whiskies, as was the Ballantine Serenity.

Ardmore Traditional Cask is a double cask matured whisky. It was aged in bourbon barrels. The final maturation was in quarter casks to help enrich the whisky due to the smaller size of the cask type. It is a lightly smokey and rich Highland whisky.

Ballantine's Vitality, a plentiful, pure grain scotch whisky featuring a revitalising taste and distinctive aroma. The Ballantine Vitality Pure Grain bottle was released as part of the Ballantine's Sensation whiskies, as was the Ballantine Serenity.
A 1990's bottling of Glengoyne 12 year old single malt.  This is a light and fruity Highland malt.

A limited edition whisky from Johnnie Walker, inspired by the super popular television programme, Game of Thrones.
This new blend features malts from Cardhu and Clynelish and is presented at a strength of 41.7% abv. The bottle has a temperature-sensitive graphic that will spell out the words “Winter is here” when it's at the right temperature for serving.

This is an older style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet.  The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers.

This is an older style bottling of Glengoyne 10 year old single malt.
This is a highland malt and somewhat of a favourite in the Asian market.
The first official bottling from Glen Keith.  This 10-year-old was released in the 1990s when the distillery was owned by dearly departed Seagrams.
This lot contains 4 x 5cl & 1 x 3cl miniature bottle:

Old Pulteney 12 year old whisky has won many awards. It boasts lingering sea tastes with a sweetness.
This is an older bottle from the late 1990s.

This 10 year old single malt is a great example of some of Fettercairns best whisky, this is an older discontinued botting.  Fettercairn, owned by Whyte and Mackay distillers, is a Highland distillery.

A classic version of the 12-year-old expression by Glenlivet. The distillery was the first in the Highlands to be granted a license under the act of 1823.
They say their secret is the crystal clear water and the Highland air.

This is an older style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet.  The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers.
Now discontinued, this 10-year-old is from the Speyside Distillery.  They started production in 1990 after over 25 years of building.
This bottle is from an Braeval distillery, it is a 10 year old Highland malt which was released under the Deerstalker brand.
Matured only in air-dried, hand-selected ex-bourbon casks, Old Pulteney 12 yo Whisky has won many awards. Lingering sea tastes with a sweetness.

This lot includes a 70cl & 5cl. This bottling from Antiquary is a blend of some of Scotland's greatest 12-year-old malt and grain whiskies, including Royal Lochnagar, Tomatin, Cragganmore, Mortlach, Bowmore, Glenkinchie to name a few. Also, a quirky feature is that In the lid of this bottle box, there is a coaster that pops out!

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Jim Beam - 8 Year Old One Unified Company 1L
DESCRIPTION:
Ever since the prohibition, Jim Beam is the man we should be thanking for his tremendous vision to try and create some of the best bourbon in the world. 
This bottle was commissioned in January to celebrate the newly unified company.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Bell's Deluxe - 12 Year Old - De Luxe 1970s
DESCRIPTION: A globally popular blend since it's beginnings in 1851. This blend has matured in Oak casks and can be recognised by its mellowness.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Glenfiddich - Pure Malt Set (with 2 x Crystal Glasses)
DESCRIPTION: Released to celebrate the distilleries Centenary in 1987, this rare bottle Glenfiddich Pure Malt is becoming increasingly hard to find.  It includes two imported crystal glasses.

Old Pulteney 12 year old whisky has won many awards. It boasts lingering sea tastes with a sweetness.
This is an older bottle from the late 1990s.

From the Isle of Skye Talisker 10 Year Old from the 1990s.This older style of the packaging features the Isle of Skye mapped on a stone. 
Talisker was originally formed in 1930 by Kenneth and Hugh Macaskill.   The two gentlemen are in fact brothers. The fire in November 1960 resulted in a new distillery being built which included two new stills. Now part of Diagio classic malt line up, a great one for island collectors and lovers of the Isle of Skye.
This older style 12 year old was bottled in the 1990s by Glenturret.  This entry-level bottling was discontinued in 2003, when it was replaced by the 10 year-old.
From the iconic Armagnac producer Janneau, Grand Armagnac VSOP in a presentation tin.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: GlenDronach, Glenglassaugh & BenRiach - Mini Selection (5 x 5cl)
DESCRIPTION: This lot contains a selection from three Highland distilleries.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Johnnie Walker - 12 Year Old - Black Label
DESCRIPTION: Johnnie Walker Black Label's iconic square bottle makes it one of the world's most recognisable whiskies.  It is a blend of around 40 whiskies.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Canadian Club - Classic 12 Year Old (& 5cl Mini)
DESCRIPTION: This Canadian Club was aged for 12 years - the extra 6 years maturing in wood produces a darker spirit with more of the traditional characteristics of aged whiskies and a richer, more aromatic flavour.

The ISC employees were rewarded by developing the Ar Deoch for winning the F18 Market of the year in the Diageo Global Excellence in Supply Chains Awards. It exhumes a scent reminiscent of raspberries and fresh fruits and over time this leaves the sweet fragrance of freshly cut flowers. It provides a warm finish and has a sweet smoky aftertaste.

This Ballantine's 17 year old bottling is from the 1990s.  Matured in oak casks and bottled by Ballantine & Son Limited distillers. This bottling was released for the Asian market. This is a 50cl bottling.
Traditional Oak Cask, a core bottling by Benrmoach, with 80% of casks were bourbon-matured and the remaining 20% matured in sherry casks.
This lot includes 7 x miniature bottles:
A Speyside single malt, aged in a combination of ex-sherry and ex-bourbon casks.

This is a 6 year old bottling of Craigellachie which was distilled in February 2008 and specially selected and bottled exclusively for The Whisky Shop customers as part of thier Glenkeir Treasures collection.
Morrisons Glen Garioch Distillery is situated in Old Meldrum Scotland. This is their original introductory 8 Yera Old single malt.
A 10 year old distilled and bottled by Aberlour Glenlivet Distillery.  It has been matured in sherry and bourbon casks.

This is an older style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet.  The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers.
From Rother, a small town in the heart of Speyside, Speyburn produced this non-age statement Bradan Orach bottling. (Bradan Orach is Gaelic for Golden Salmon - the very best kind of salmon).
This is a 10 year old bottling by The Tormore Distillery, each hour you can hear the chimes from the distillery across the quiet hills and tumbling waters of Speyside.

A lovely bottling of Glenmorangie 10 year old, with presentation box. The 'original' sets a high standard for Highland whisky, and has gone from strength to strength since its slightly controversial packaging redesign a few years ago.

This Glenfiddich bottling won the Gold Medal at the 2007 International Wine and Spirit Competition.
It has been aged for a total of 12 years in both Oloroso Sherry and Bourbon Cask.

A lovely bottling of Glenmorangie 10 year old, with presentation box. The 'original' sets a high standard for Highland whisky, and has gone from strength to strength since its slightly controversial packaging redesign a few years ago. 
 
This is a limited edition bottling showing they have the tallest stills in Scotland.

This Glenfiddich bottling won the Gold Medal at the 2007 International Wine and Spirit Competition.
It has been aged for a total of 12 years in both Oloroso Sherry and Bourbon Cask.
A 10 year old distilled and bottled by Aberlour Glenlivet Distillery.  It has been matured in sherry and bourbon casks.
A peated malt spirit from England's only distillery, the Norfolk-based St George's. Matured for only 22 months n a first-fill American bourbon cask, it therefore can't be called whisky.
Tomatin 10 Year Old bottled in the 1990's as you can see by the old-style label.
This Glen Gyle 8 year old highland malt scotch whisky which has been bottled and shipped by Fraser MacDonald Distillery Co. Ltd.
This is a 12 year old single malt from Royal Lochnagar Distillery. It is of the three distilleries in Scotland ever to be granted the title of 'Royal' in front of their name.

This Glenfiddich bottling won the Gold Medal at the 2007 International Wine and Spirit Competition.
It has been aged for a total of 12 years in both Oloroso Sherry and Bourbon Cask.
A 12 year old which has proved to be so popular they have created a limited edition tin for the 200th anniversary of Chivas Brothers.

This 10 year old is an older style bottling from Glenkinchie Distillery, that comes presented in the famous orange box - with the classic malt stamp on the front of the box. The Glenkinchie 10 year old has since been replaced by the 12 year old.
Tailfire is one of two 2014 releases from The Singleton of Dufftown. Aged in a combination of European and American oak casks, it is a vibrant, fruity and fresh whisky.

This is a 75cl bottling of Haig Dimple 12-year-old blended Whisky.
It is also known as Haig Pinch across the water for our friends in the US.
This blend includes single malts from Glenkinchie and Linkwood.

Cardhu 12 year old single malt whisky from Speyside, Scotland.  This single malt was purely produced at the distillery in Morayshire, Scotland.  Although recognised as a Speyside whisky, they actually advertise being Highland Scotch Whisky.

Chivas 12 Year Old is a multi-award winning premier scotch whisky, an artful blend of many different malt and grain scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. 
This lot comes in a metal circular presentation tin.

Isle of Skye 8 year old has its origins in that most celebrated of Scottish islands: Skye, home of the Clan Macleod.
Ian Macleod, the founder of 'Isle of Skye' was justifiably proud of his families 19th-century recipe, which contains a high proportion of carefully selected Island and Speyside malts.
Its smoothness, mellowness and quality are guaranteed by the fact that every whisky in recipe has been mellowed in oak casks for at least 8 years - the recognised age of maturity for many malt whiskies.

A 70cl of the medicinal 10 year old from Islay's bestselling distillery, Laphroaig.  In making Laphroaig, malted barley is dried over a peat fire.  The smoke from this peat, found only on Islay, gives Laphroaig its particularly rich flavour.

Ardbeg Supernova SN2014 is one of the peatiest (110ppm) and explosively flavoured Ardbegs ever.  This limited edition Committee Release celebrates the incredible story that Ardbeg successfully launched whisky into space and it returned!

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Allied Distillers - 17 Year Old (Special Edition - 25th July 2005)
DESCRIPTION: This 17 year old blended whisky is a limited edition Allied Distillers bottling given to staff members when the company was sold to Chivas Brothers in 2005. There is Ballantine's branding on the bottle cap, suggesting what is inside.
An older bottling of single malt from the famous Glenfiddich distillery in the heart of Speyside.

This Glenfiddich bottling won the Gold Medal at the 2007 International Wine and Spirit Competition.
It has been aged for a total of 12 years in both Oloroso Sherry and Bourbon Cask.

First revealed towards the end of 2014, the Founder's Reserve was to replace The Glenlivet 12 year old in many mature markets (despite initial indications that it would sit beside it).  The bottling is named in tribute to distillery founder George Smith.
This Canadian Club was aged in white oak casks, it is a barrel blended Canadian whisky. This is a 1 litre bottling

Dalwhinnie Winter's Gold was introduced in 2015 inspired by its location in the Highland's of Scotland, making it one of the highest and coldest distilleries - "Crafted by the Cold".  It is made exclusively with the spirit that has been distilled between October and March.

Laphroaig  Select has been created using a combination of whisky from a number of different types of cask, including Oloroso Sherry butts, white American oak, Pedro Ximenez seasoned hogsheads, quarter casks and first-fill bourbon casks.
From the iconic Armagnac producer Janneau, Grand Armagnac VSOP in a presentation tin.

This is an older style bottling from an unnamed Islay distillery.
'Illeach' means - a true man from Islay.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Johnnie Walker -12 Year Old - Black Label
DESCRIPTION: Johnnie Walker Black Label's iconic square bottle makes it one of the world's most recognisable whiskies.  It is a blend of around 40 whiskies.

Laphroaig  Select has been created using a combination of whisky from a number of different types of cask, including Oloroso Sherry butts, white American oak, Pedro Ximenez seasoned hogsheads, quarter casks and first-fill bourbon casks.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Whisky Galore - 15 Year Old - Atlantic Reserve
DESCRIPTION: This Whisky Galore is a 15-year-old blended malt that includes whisky from all the major regions in Scotland. Named after the famous book and film about the sinking of the SS Politician.
A bottle of Jura 10 Year Old.  Originally built in 1810, the distillery fell into disrepair and wasn't revived until the 1960's by two local estate owners.
Ardmore Legacy was launched in 2014 to replace Ardmore Traditional. Ardmore Legacy is made with 80% peated and 20% unpeated malt.

First revealed towards the end of 2014, the Founder's Reserve was to replace The Glenlivet 12 year old in many mature markets (despite initial indications that it would sit beside it).  The bottling is named in tribute to distillery founder George Smith.

This Glenfiddich bottling won the Gold Medal at the 2007 International Wine and Spirit Competition.
It has been aged for a total of 12 years in both Oloroso Sherry and Bourbon Cask.
This popular Irish whiskey has been triple distilled and aged 10 years. It was matured in bourbon and oloroso sherry casks for notes of honey, vanilla and ripe fruit.

This long-established standard blend was named after the legendary ‘Long John’ Macdonald, who founded Ben Nevis distillery. Its malt was supposedly a key ingredient, though Long John’s core later became Tormore, which began distilling in 1961.
Irish Mist is a liqueur with a devoted following, it is a unique aged Irish spirit-based liqueur.

A gift to the Millennium celebrations, Ballantine's M 2000 is an especially unusual bottle. This Liqueur originated in the late 1960s specifically for the market in America and therefore radiates a special nature.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Grampian Country Food Group - 10 Year Old - Pure Malt
DESCRIPTION: Specially selected for Grampian Country Food Group, this 'Pure Malt Scotch Whisky' was aged for 10 years.
Irish Mist is a liqueur with a devoted following, it is a unique aged Irish spirit-based liqueur.

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: House of Peers - Blended Scotch Whisky
DESCRIPTION: Distilled, blended and bottled in Scotland. This blend is from Douglas Laing.

A fully organic Bruichladdich 2003 - a century ago most barley was organically grown; natural fertilisers – seaweed, peat and manure – were harnessed in a way that respected the year’s agricultural cycle. 2003 was a particularly fine harvest of Chalice barley for William rose at Culblair Farm. Supreme quality barley combined with a slow trickle-distillation to do it justice, and new oak has resulted in Bruichladdich's creamiest release yet.  This is a limited edition release of 15,000 numbered bottles and Bruichladdich's first organic release - The name means 'In the Traditional Way.'

The Macallan Sherry Oak 12 Years Old forms part of the Sherry Oak range which features a series of single malt whiskies matured exclusively in hand-picked sherry seasoned oak casks from Jerez for richness and complexity. 
This is a 5cl bottling.

This triple distilled single malt scotch whisky from the Auchentoshan Distillery comes from a first fill North American oak casks. This bottling has a vanilla and coconut sweetness from a first fill bourbon casks.

This young blend has been bottled by Clysdale Scotch Whisky Company in Glasgow Scotland.
A premium range from the blending company.
Irish Mist is a liqueur with a devoted following, it is a unique aged Irish spirit-based liqueur.
Ardmore Legacy was launched in 2014 to replace Ardmore Traditional. Ardmore Legacy is made with 80% peated and 20% unpeated malt.

BOTTLER: The Vintage Malt Whisky Co. Ltd
DESCRIPTION: This is an 8-year-Old whisky from Tambowie, named after the lost farm-based distillery near Milngavie, which closed in 1914. Tambowie is a Highland blended malt produced by the Vintage Malt Whisky Co. Ltd, also based at Milngavie.

Old St Andrews Clubhouse, a blended whisky in the bottle form of a golf ball-shaped decanter.
Certainly one for the golf fans out there.

Connoisseur older bottling of Bell's 12 year old is a premium offering from Bell's. The blend includes malt from Dufftown Distillery as well as Inchgower amongst others. 
This is a 75cl bottling.

This is a 13 1/3 FL.OZ bottling of Haig Dimple blended Whisky. It is also known as Haig Pinch across the water for our friends in the US.
This blend includes single malts from Glenkinchie and Linkwood.
Braemar blended whisky - distilled, blended & bottled in Scotland.
This gift set includes 6 X 5:
This lot includes 4 x Glenfiddich minis:

DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Bowmore - 10 Year Old - Forth Bridge Centennial (5cl)
DESCRIPTION: This is a limited edition 5cl bottling of Bowmore 10 Year Old, celebrating the Forth Bridge Centennial.  This is one of 5000 bottles.
A 5cl miniature bottle of Glenfarclas-Glenlivet 8 Year Old All Malt Unblended Scotch Whisky from around the 1960s. Bonded and bottled by Grant Bonding Co. Ltd.
This is a French Red Wine. 12.5% AV, 75cl.

This small-batch bourbon, distilled, aged and bottled by Maker's Mark distillery in Loretto, Kentucky. Maker's Mark bourbon was first introduced in 1953 by "Bill" Samuels Snr, produced with the assistance with Julian 'Pappy' Van Winkle. Each batch is less than 19 barrels.
A well sought after 12 year old Highland Park single malt that was bottled in the 1990's.
